description.value:
Your skill with lighter weapons allows you to wield one alongside your net.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Two-Weapon Fighting.

Benefits
You can treat a net as a one-handed ranged weapon, allowing you to wield a light or one-handed melee weapon and still make ranged attacks with your net. When you use your light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an entangled opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls and on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.

Normal
A net is a two-handed ranged weapon.

Combat Trick
When you use a light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an opponent entangled by your net, you can spend up to 5 stamina points when you hit the opponent to gain a bonus on the damage roll equal to double the number of stamina points you spent.
